 2019-12882019-08-27,  ,  NRCAN,  , 
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
PrecisAppointment of C. PETER WATSON of Sherwood Park, Alberta, to be Chief Executive Officer of the Canadian Energy Regulator, to hold office during pleasure for a term commencing on August 28, 2019 and ending on September 8, 2020.
